Intervention: - Breast images with FFDM and DBT
FFDM Plus DBT: Fujifilm Aspira Crystal System
Eligibility: Women participating in FMSU004A protocol with known clinical status
Subjects with unknown clinical status not participating in FMSU004A.
Results: Compare by subject under curve (AUC): FFDM only vs DBT Plus FFDM

• POM scores will require a correct location of the lesions, so that in one case of cancer, if the reader has recorded one or more findings in the case, but none of them is determined by the veracity to correspond to the location or locations of a proven malignant tumour, a POM score of 0 will be assigned to the case. The statistician will provide graphical representations of each reader's ROC curve for each test condition. For each reader, the difference between the CSA for the FFDM read in conjunction with the FFDM plus the DBT will be presented. The statistician will perform a CSA MRMC comparison between the FFDM read in conjunction with the FFDM and the DBT using the Dorfman, Berbaum & Metz MRMC method (1992).
Title of the arm/group: FFDM Plus DBT
Description of the arm/group: Breast images with FFDM and DBT
FFDM Plus DBT: Fujifilm Aspira Crystal System
Description of the arm/group: Breast images with FFDM alone
